trans-unit.source:
\n

The exception that is thrown for invalid casting or explicit conversion.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxxxxxxx xxxx xx xxxxxx xxx xxxxxxx xxxxxxx xx xxxxxxxx xxxxxxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

The error message that explains the reason for the exception.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxxx xxxxxxx xxxx xxxxxxxx xxx xxxxxx xxx xxx xxxxxxxxx.

trans-unit.source:
\n

The exception that is the cause of the current exception.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxxxxxxx xxxx xx xxx xxxxx xx xxx xxxxxxx xxxxxxxxx.

trans-unit.source: If the innerException parameter is not null, the current exception is raised in a catch block that handles the inner exception.
trans-unit.target: Xx xxx $xx$xxxxxXxxxxxxxx$$xx$ xxxxxxxxx xx xxx $xxxxxx$xxxx$$xxxxxx$$ xxx xxxxxxx xxxxxxxxx xx xxxxxx xx x $xxxxxx$xxxxx$$xxxxxx$ xxxxx xxxx xxxxxxx xxx xxxxx xxxxxxxxx.

trans-unit.source:
\n

The message that indicates the reason the exception occurred.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxxxxx xxxx xxxxxxxxx xxx xxxxxx xxx xxxxxxxxx xxxxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

The error code (HRESULT) value associated with the exception.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxxx xxxx $XXXXXXX$ xxxxx xxxxxxxxxx xxxx xxx xxxxxxxxx.$$x$$x
